name: Pitch and Release (BETA)
description:
Arcade style games based on "pitch and kick" mechanic.

(This is a beta that includes one mode)

Game modes:

1- Hit The Target

2- Death Volley (COMING SOON)

3- Alien Invasion (COMING SOON)

Credits:

This project is part of a Game Design and Development program provided by Michigan State University, Prof. Brian Winn and Coursera.

Celebrate Mundanity: 

Game Design: Faris Turkistani

Programming: Ibra.EXE

Marketing Production: Asaad Bukhari

Music:

Eaters - Crystal Systems https://freemusicarchive.org/music/eaters/watchmaker-untitled/crystal-systems

Ketsa - Live-It (Instrumental) https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Ketsa/as-above-so-below/live-it-instrumental

Mr. Ruiz - Jamaica Jive https://freemusicarchive.org/music/mrruiz/winter-haze-summer-daze/jamaica-jive

Mr Smith - The Get Away https://freemusicarchive.org/music/mr-smith/nomad/the-get-away
